title: Start
body:
Hey Bitch
[[Got to Dash|Player1 Dash]]
[[I'ma Fireball you|Player1 FireBall]]
[[Oh this? It's my shield.|Player1 Shield]]
[[*SINGS WILDLY*|Player1 Sing]]

title: Player1 Dash
body:
I'm gonna Dash you in the tit.
[[I choose Dash]]
[[I Choose Fireball|Player2 Fireball]]
[[I Choose Shield|Player2 Shield]]
[[I Choose Sing|Player2 Sing]]

title: Player1 FireBall
body:
I'ma Fireball you!
[[I Choose Dash|Player2 Dash]]
[[I choose Fireball]]
[[I Choose Shield|Player2 Shield]]
[[I Choose Sing|Player2 Sing]]

title: Player1 Shield
body:
Oh this? It's my shield.
[[I Choose Dash|Player2 Dash]]
[[I Choose Fireball|Player2 Fireball]]
[[I choose Shield]]
[[I Choose Sing|Player2 Sing]]

title: Player1 Sing
body:
"I BELIEVE IN A THING CALLED LOVE"
[[I Choose Dash|Player2 Dash]]
[[I Choose Fireball|Player2 Fireball]]
[[I Choose Shield|Player2 Shield]]
[[I choose Sing]]

title: CloseText
body: The girls looked at each other, knowing that the first girl to class would get to sit next to senpai.

title: Player2 Dash
body:
I'm gonna dash you right in the face.
[[Oh no, class! I have to get to Senpai!|CloseText]]

title: Player2 Fireball
body:
I'm going to burn you to death
[[Oh no, class! I have to get to Senpai!|CloseText]]

title: Player2 Sing
body:
You're voice is...interesting. Maybe I can teach you to sing.
[[Oh no, class! I have to get to Senpai!|CloseText]]

title: Player2 Shield
body:
Yes. I have a shield. Yes. I will hurt you with it. 
[[Oh no, class! I have to get to Senpai!|CloseText]]
